Step 1: git clone https://github.com/Ganapati/RsaCtfTool . make a python venv, pip install the requirements, sudo apt-get install dependencies of the dependencies (mpfr, libmpc)
Step 2: directory should have the /RsaCtfTool folder and the /venv folder. download server.py in the main directory.
Step 3: python3 server.py and go to 127.0.0.1:5000 
Step 4 (the crypto stuff): take these two numbers: 
N = 
e = 65537

Go to the website and put the big number in the text field for N and the small number for e.
Submit, and it should crack the cipher relatively quickly.

Random numbers will not work, its all RSA crypto stuff (see wikipedia page to know more)

Other numbers: 
N=9783023 , e=7 (returns empty encrypted message)
